DOC.criteria: Women medical indication ovarian stimulation therapy purpose IVF ICSI . Firsttime ovarian stimulate therapy IVF ICSI . Ovarian stimulation therapy exclusively Ovaleap® . GnRH antagonist protocol . BodyMassIndex ( BMI ) < 30 kg/m2 . Duration menstrual cycle 24 35 day . Additional criterion apply , please contact investigator information Combined application IVF ICSI Ovarian hyperstimulation Ovaleap® consecutive `` social freezing '' . Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) . Endometriosis ( AFS ( American Fertility Society ) grade 3 4 ) . Uterine myoma ( intramural > 4 cm , submucosal ) . Hydrosalpinx ( one side side ) .
